abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Education Project consists
            of: (a) construction of and equipment for a technical
            secondary school at Fort Lamy; (b) construction of and
            equipment for conversion of an existing technical secondary
            school at Fort Archambault into a vocational training
            center; (c) transfer of the proposed agricultural technicial
            training center (Credit 126-CD) from Fort Lamy to Fort
            Archambault; and (d) a study of training schemes for young farmers.
